        Parameters:

        permission - - the permission we want to remove from the user

      • if cant be changed : arr[0] = whatHappend.failedIsResponsibleForAstage , arr[1] =ArrayList he is involved in

      • testifUserIcmPermissionCanBeAdded

        public java.lang.Object[] testifUserIcmPermissionCanBeAdded(User changedUser,
                                                            User.icmPermission permission,
                                                            ChangeRequest request)
        Parameters:
        changedUser - - the user we want to add a permission to
        permission - - the permission we want to add
        request - - the permission related to the permission
        for permissions: estimator,executionLeader,examiner:
        - send a ChangeRequest entity which the user will supervise
        for permissions:informationTechnologiesDepartmentManager,changeControlCommitteeChairman,changeControlCommitteeMember send :
        - ChangeRequest ==null
        Returns:
